content.query:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW dbo.vw_ft_indicadores AS
SELECT 
    t.TIME ,
    t.Ts_Valor,
    t.CodigoNacional,
    h.HR_Valor,
    v.dd_Valor,
    v.ff_Valor,
    v.VRB_Valor
FROM dbo.temperatura T 
    INNER JOIN dbo.viento V  
        ON CAST(t.time AS DATE) = CAST(v.time AS DATE)
        AND t.CodigoNacional = v.CodigoNacional
    INNER JOIN dbo.humedad H 
        ON CAST(t.time AS DATE) = CAST(h.time AS DATE)
        AND t.CodigoNacional= h.CodigoNacional
